item.content:encoded:
October 2021 – June 2022

Play Video

Related Documents :

Sound Design Document
Build
Game Trailer

• BET'N'DIE

Online PC game – 4 Players FFA

UE4 – Wwise

 

BET’n’DIE is an online FFA FPS where the most daring gamblers compete in a space arena by piloting ARCs robots.

This is my graduation project, made by working with 19 people. For the audio, I worked with Baptiste Denoux as a composer and sound designer.

I was in charge of the majority of weapons SFX, announcer voice design, machines SFX, foleys, as well as some music production.

But I was mainly responsible of all the technical sound design and blueprint integration. I worked on a lot of interactive system using blueprints for handling the announcer integration, all the sound design playback or the interactive music.

On top of that, I was in charge of the audio spatialization, from the audio level design (AkGometry / AkPortal / AkRoom) to the fine tuning of all the Attenuation Sharesets.
In the end, I worked closely with the developers on debuging and optimizing the game, audio-wise.

→ This is my most advanced work so far, so don’t forget to check out the related documents for more information.

item.title: Good Soup
item.dc:creator: Dovak88
item.description: September 2021 • Good Soup! Co-op 3D platformer Unity – FMOD Good Soup! is a co-op 3D platformer game made by a team of Isart’s students as part of a game jam (GameWeek 2021) We had 4 days to make this game from start to finish. In this project I did the sound design and […]
item.content:encoded:
September 2021

• Good Soup!

Co-op 3D platformer

Unity – FMOD

Good Soup! is a co-op 3D platformer game made by a team of Isart’s students as part of a game jam (GameWeek 2021)

We had 4 days to make this game from start to finish. In this project I did the sound design and the music composition with a friend.

The music was really fun to make, we had this idea that when switching vegetables (to access new abilities) another intrument would take the lead.
The music is essentially us jamming on a groove we made.

We had a month to make a 2D-platfomer game from start to finish. In this project I did the sound design, music composition and FMOD integration. I took an extra step and […]
item.content:encoded:
April 2021

• Eterlou

2D Platformer game

Unity – FMOD

Eterlou is a platformer game made by a team of Isart’s students.

We had a month to make a 2D-platfomer game from start to finish. In this project I did the sound design, music composition and FMOD integration. I took an extra step and worked closely with the developers by handling the audio integration in unity myself. In order to achieve that I made an audio manager and some other audio related scripts  in c#. This allowed the developers to focus more on physics and graphic integration.

 

Related Documents :

Sound Design Document
One Page Concept
Build
Mattéo Siscaro · Eterlou

The mixing was done in binaural using Spat Revolution and Reaper.

In this project I did the sound design […]
item.content:encoded:
September 2020

 
 

• Agapé

Mobile Game – Visual Novel

Unity

 

 
 

Agapé is a mobile game made by a team of Isart’s students as part of a game jam (GameWeek 2020)

We had 4 days to make this game from start to finish. In this project I did the sound design and the music composition.

It was a real challenge because I had a lot of small musical segments to make in order to illustrate the feelings of the main character who is going through a depressive episode.

 

Mattéo Siscaro · Agapé - Game Week 2020

For this short film, I worked with Adrien Sesé on the sound design, audio editing, and mixing using Reaper and Protools. Our primary focus […]
item.content:encoded:
August 2020

• Enochia

2D Animated Short Film – Noémie Bevierre

Enochia is a 2D animated short film made by Noémie Bevierre from Atelier de Sèvres as her graduation project.

For this short film, I worked with Adrien Sesé on the sound design, audio editing, and mixing using Reaper and Protools.
Our primary focus was to give an ethereal quality to the film by working a lot on the ambiances and on the crystals SFX.


We also had a lot of fun designing cute voices for the main character’s reactions.
